class Mobile:
    def dial(self, number):
        print(f"dialing number {number}")

    def ring(self):
        print("ringing using built in tones.....")

class SmartMobile(Mobile):

    def ring(self):
        """
        overriding a Method
        """
        print("ringing using custom ring tones .... ")

smart_phone = SmartMobile()

smart_phone.dial("1234567890")
smart_phone.ring()

output.after:
class Mobile:
    def dial(self, number):
        print(f"dialing number {number}")

    def ring(self):
        print("ringing using built in tones.....")

class SmartMobile(Mobile):

    def ring(self):
        """
        overriding a Method
        """
        print("ringing using custom ring tones .... ")

# Create an instance of the class
mobile = Mobile()
mobile.dial(12345)
mobile.ring()

smart = SmartMobile()
smart.dial(12345)
smart.ring
